name: FL0W
description:
~Play Fullscreen!!!~ 
Hello! You will be guiding Flow. A young woman with a unique ability, she can reverse the laws of physics and redirect the flow of energy at will. Coupled with a few tools her late grandfather left behind, she wants to explore what's left of the world and bring meaning to her life.
Guide her through puzzles and slowly uncover secrets of the world before you.

Brackeys 2020.2 Game Jam: Flow
Development Build WebGL 1.0

Controls:
WASD / Arrow : Movement
Space : Jump

R : Rotate
Enter : Rewind Energy

Tab: Reload Level
